ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class SmsReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.SmsReceiver

  • public class SmsReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver
    Class extending BroadcastReceiver, receives SMS and handles them accordingly to application settings and SMS senders phone number.
    Since:
    0.9beta
    Version:
    2.1.4
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
             Intent intent)
        Overridden method to receive intent, reacts on incoming SMS. This receiver take proper actions depending on application settings and SMS senders phone number.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        intent - Intent
        See Also:
        smsHandler(Context), removeCountryCode(), #checkAndGetAlarm(Context), getSmsReceivePrefs(Context), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context)

      • smsHandler

        private void smsHandler(Context context)
        Method to handle incoming SMS. Aborts the systems broadcast and stores the SMS in the device inbox. This method is also responsible for playing ringtone via NoiseHandler.makeNoise(Context, int, boolean, boolean) , vibrate and start intent.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        See Also:
        onReceive(Context, Intent), getSmsReceivePrefs(Context), makeNoise(Context, int, boolean, boolean), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), logAlarm(List, Context), setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context), acquire(Context), release(), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.DatabaseHandler, addAlarm(Alarm), getAllAlarm(), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.Alarm, ax.ha.it.smsalarm.AlarmTypes

      • isAlarm

        private void isAlarm(Context context)
        To check if received SMS is any alarm. The check is done by a equality control of the senders phone number and the phone numbers read from SharedPreferences. An additional "0" is added to the senders phone number and a equality control is done by that number also, this behavior is needed because a country code could have been removed and this compensates for that.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        See Also:
        logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context)

      • removeCountryCode

        private void removeCountryCode()
        To remove any country code from the SMS senders phone number.
        Following county codes are supported:
      • USA, Canada - +1
      • France - +33
      • Finland - +358
      • Slovenia - +386
      • Austria - +43
      • United Kingdom - +44
      • Denmark - +45
      • Sweden - +46
      • Norway - +47
      • Germany - +49
      • New Zeeland - +64
See Also:
logCat(LogPriorities, String, String)
